sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_42e92d92dbf8db40497856f3ce96197f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.codeReviewUtils</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>codeReviewUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var codeReviewUtils = Class.create();
codeReviewUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    type: 'codeReviewUtils',

    updateSet: "",


    // Executed from ui action on code review record
    // Tests rule against a specific update
    testCodeRule: function() {
        try {
            var updateRecId = this.getParameter("sysparm_updateRec");
            var returnResultsTo = this.getParameter("sysparm_rulesRec");
            var updateRecord = new GlideRecord('sys_update_xml');
            if (updateRecord.get(updateRecId)) {

                var update_table = updateRecord.name.match(/(.*)_([a-z0-9]{32})/i)[1];

                var results = this.checkUpdate(updateRecord, update_table, returnResultsTo);
                gs.info("cru.results: " + results)

                return JSON.stringify(results);

            }

            return false;

        } catch (err) {
            return "Error: "+err;
        }
    },

    reviewCode: function(updateSet_gr) {

        var answer;
        this.updateSet = updateSet_gr.getUniqueValue();

        // Remove any existing records
        this.removeExistingReviews(this.updateSet)

        // Get all updates for update set
        var updateRecord = new GlideRecord('sys_update_xml');
        updateRecord.addEncodedQuery("update_set=" + this.updateSet + "^action!=DELETE^ORaction=NULL");
        updateRecord.query();

        while (updateRecord.next()) {
            try {
                var updatedRecord = updateRecord.name.match(/(.*)_([a-z0-9]{32})/i);
                update_table = updatedRecord[1];
                update_sysID = updatedRecord[2];

            } catch (err) {
                continue;
            }

            this.checkUpdate(updateRecord, update_table);
        }
    },

    removeExistingReviews: function(updateSet_sysId){
        var existingReviews = new GlideRecord('u_code_review_results');
        existingReviews.addEncodedQuery("u_update_set="+updateSet_sysId+"^u_status=Needs Review");
        existingReviews.query();
        while (existingReviews.next()) {
            existingReviews.u_status = "Canceled";
            existingReviews.update();
        }

    },

    checkUpdate: function(updateRecord, update_table, returnResultsTo) {



        var payload = updateRecord.payload.toString();
        var query = "u_table=" + update_table;
        if(returnResultsTo)
        	query +="^sys_id="+returnResultsTo;

        var codeRule = new GlideRecord('u_code_review_rules');
        codeRule.addEncodedQuery(query);

        codeRule.query();
        while (codeRule.next()) {

            // Not sure how I want to do this yet
            // var updatedRecordGR = new GlideRecord(update_table)
            // updatedRecordGR.get(update_sysID)
            // if (GlideFilter.checkRecord(updatedRecordGR, codeRule.u_when_to_run))

            var vars = {
                "payload": payload,
                "codeRule": codeRule
            };

            // Advanved Rules
            if (codeRule.u_advanced){

                try{
                    // Evaluate the script from the rule
                    var evaluator = new GlideScopedEvaluator();
                    evaluator.evaluateScript(codeRule, 'u_code_review_script', vars);
                } catch(err){
                    answer = {
                        "status":"Error",
                        "results":"Error with Advanced Rules script: "+err
                    };
                }

            }

            // Basic Rules
            else {
                gs.info('basic script')

                try{
                    // Evaluate the script from the rule
                    var evaluator = new GlideScopedEvaluator();
                    evaluator.evaluateScript(codeRule, 'u_basic_script', vars);
                } catch(err){
                    answer = {
                        "status":"Error",
                        "results":"Error with Basic Rules script: "+err
                    };
                }
            }

            // Return the result if this is a test
            if (returnResultsTo) {
                return answer;
            } else

            if (answer.status != 'passed') {
                this.insertResultsRecord(codeRule, updateRecord, update_table, update_sysID, answer);
            }

            // Need to return 
        }
    },

    insertResultsRecord: function(codeRule, updateRecord, update_table, update_sysID, answer) {

        var resultRec = new GlideRecord('u_code_review_results');
        resultRec.initialize();
        resultRec.u_level = codeRule.u_level + "";
        resultRec.u_status = "Needs Review";
        resultRec.u_results = JSON.stringify(answer.results,undefined,2);
        resultRec.u_update_set = this.updateSet;
        resultRec.u_update = updateRecord.getUniqueValue();
        resultRec.u_related_record_table = update_table;
        resultRec.u_related_record = update_sysID;
        resultRec.u_rule = codeRule.getUniqueValue();
        resultRec.u_suggestion = codeRule.u_suggestion + "";
        resultRec.insert();
    }
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>brent.llewellyn</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-03-14 12:43:58</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>42e92d92dbf8db40497856f3ce96197f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>29</sys_mod_count><sys_name>codeReviewUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_42e92d92dbf8db40497856f3ce96197f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>brent.llewellyn</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-29 18:13:18</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_code_review_rules</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="u_code_review_rules">u_fieldVALCHANGES^ORu_termsVALCHANGES^ORu_tableVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="u_field" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="u_terms" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="u_table" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Populate Vars Object</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	var Vars = {

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="u_code_review_rules"><u_code_review_rules action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><sys_created_by>brent.llewellyn</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-03-13 16:31:57</sys_created_on><sys_id>c1731946dbf0db40497856f3ce9619c6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>brent.llewellyn</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-03-13 19:34:19</sys_updated_on><u_active>true</u_active><u_code_review_script><![CDATA[var results, status = "good";

gs.info(payload.indexOf("<script>")+17)
gs.info(payload.indexOf("</script>")-2)
var script = payload.substring(payload.indexOf("<script>")+17,payload.indexOf("</script>")-2);
gs.info("script_: "+script)

if (script.indexOf("gs.info") > -1){
	status = "error";
	results = "found somthing";
}

answer = {
	"status":status,
	"results":results
};]]></u_code_review_script><u_level/><u_name>ui action - gs.info</u_name><u_table display_value="" name="sys_ui_action">sys_ui_action</u_table><u_when_to_run/></u_code_review_rules></record_update>
